uPVC Windows

Energy-efficient, soundproof, and stylish windows for the modern home.

Home > uPVC Windows

Why Choose uPVC?

Unplasticized Polyvinyl Chloride (uPVC) is a widely used material for windows and doors due to its exceptional durability and low maintenance. Unlike traditional aluminum or wood, uPVC is a poor conductor of heat, making it an excellent insulator.

Our uPVC windows are designed to withstand Chennai's harsh sun and heavy rains. They are UV resistant, meaning they won't fade or yellow over time. Additionally, the multi-chambered design provides superior sound insulation, keeping your home peaceful.

Key Benefits

Thermal Insulation

Keeps your home cooler in summer, reducing AC bills by up to 30%.

Sound Proof

Reduces outside noise significantly, creating a quiet indoor environment.

Weather Proof

100% waterproof and resistant to high-speed winds and storms.

High Security

Multi-point locking systems for enhanced safety and peace of mind.

Low Maintenance

No painting required. Just wipe with a damp cloth to clean.

UV Resistant

Specially formulated to resist UV radiation and prevent discoloration.

Available Styles

Sliding Windows

Space-saving design, perfect for balconies.

Casement Windows

Opens wide for maximum ventilation.

Tilt & Turn

Versatile ventilation options.
